relation: My Wii won't play Wii games but Gamecube games work fine what sould I do?

Brawl and Metroid Prime 3 have the most technically proficient graphics, but it also depends on what you mean by "best looking game." 6 years ago 1 0 bugexe answered: Go with metroid prime 3, the Metroid have been the best looking games on the gamecube consistently. Looks even better on the Wii. http://www.myfreewiidownloads.com 6 years ago 0 0 wiigamer256 answered: Metroid Prime 3 and Zelda: TW look good. 6 years ago 0 3 Ghost_Turtle answered: I know for a fact that Far Cry Wii is one of the system's best looking games, and when set up with proper high-def settings, it's simply amazing. 7 years ago 0 1 LordGheb answered: Anti-aliasing
